name: Neon Apocalypse (Kronikle)
description:
Try to survive as you journey through a hostile alien space vessel. 
Run in full screen for optimal viewing experience.

Created for the Themed Horror Game Jam #6.

Alien unit art by penusbmic and CreativeKind.
Environment textures by Jestan.
Sound effects from Universal Sound FX by Imphenzia, Horror Sounds Pack by Cafofo.
